Name: Quantum Flux
About the game: Quantum Flux is an old school style rogue-like following the crew of the Quantum Flux, and AJTilley.com's first published game. A prototype vessel aiming to save humanity from destruction, to do so it must find a way through a difficult and hostile universe to create a new home for the human race. With a blend of text adventure and live combat making the game a tricky adventure to complete. The game also features two local scoreboards, one for the main campaign and another for the combat training mini game. Quantum Flux was funded via kickstarter, initial Development was by AJTilley.com and then continued after the Kickstarter campaign by Buko Studios who contributed a lot of the artwork included also.
